EQ_DOC_OLD:
Values for Equaliseur



Values are separated with a comma : ","
With Peaking :
Frequency(Hz),gain(dB), Q
  • ex 250,-11,2.6


With LowShelf and HighShelf :
Frequency(Hz), gain(dB), slope(dB/octave)
  • ex 1250,12,11


With Notch :
Frequency(Hz),Q
  • ex 1250,5


With Lowpass and Highpass :
Cutoff Frequency(Hz), Q-Value
  • ex 12,2
EQ_DOC:
Values for Equalizer



Values are separated with a comma : ","
More info : https://github.com/HEnquist/camilladsp
EQSCOPE_DOC: Define Equalizer scope, L, R or L&R channels
TYPEEQ_DOC: Choose the type of effect you want. Available PEAKING, LOWSHELF, HIGHSHELF, HIGHPASS, LOWPASS, NOTCH
DOCEQ: Set the value for each frequency band (dB)
DELAY_LEFT_SPEAKER_DIST_DOC: Left speaker distance from listener in cm. Identical value with right = no effect
DELAY_RIGHT_SPEAKER_DIST_DOC: Right speaker distance from listener in cm. Identical value with left = no effect
RENPRESET: Choose a new name for preset
DOCSAVECURRENTEQ: Save current Equalizer to create your own custom preset
RENAME_PRESET_SW_DOC: Give a name for the preset
CONFIG_UPDATED: The configuration has been successfully updated
FREQUENCY_RANGE: Frequency Hz must be a float [10-22049] in
GAIN_RANGE: Gain must be a float [-20-20] in
Q_RANGE: Coefficient Q must be a number [0.1-40] in
SLOPE_RANGE: Slope must be a integer [1-12] in
NO_THIRDCOEFF: No need for a third coefficient in
LEFTLEVEL_DESC: Add a specific gain for this channel
RIGHTLEVEL_DESC: Add a specific gain for this channel
LOUDNESS_THRESHOLD_DOC: Below this threshold, a progressiv Loudness is applied
EQ_LOADED_USED: New Eq profil is loaded and used
CHOOSE_EQ_DOC: Choose your headphone. May take a while before displaying the list
CHOOSE_LOCALEQ_DOC: Choose txt file containing EQ settings. Files must be in /data/INTERNAL/FusionDsp/peq
ADD_REPLACE_DOC: Choose if local setting is aadded to current or replace it
MAX-EQ-REACHED: Max number of EQ reached! Last coefficient won't be used !
DOC_LATT: Attenuation must be at least equal to the max value in dB of the correction
DOC_RATT: Attenuation must be at least equal to the max value in dB of the correction
FILTER_FORMAT_MESS:
Filter


Select a File. File must be located in /INTERNAL/FusionDsp/filters
Supported type:
  • text- 32/64 bits floats line (.txt) in rephase
  • S16_LE- 16 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase
  • S24_LE- 24 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase
  • S24_LE- 32 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase
  • FLOAT_LE- 32 bits floating point (.pcm)
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits mono (.wav) from Acourate
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits IEEE-754 (.dbl) in rephase
To autoswitch with samplerate, name your filters like that :
  • myfilter-44100
  • myfilter-48000
  • myfilter-88200
WARN_SPACE_INFILTER: Spaces are not allowed in filter name. Please check!
DOC_LFILTER:
Left filter


Select Right filter file. File must be located in /INTERNAL/FusionDsp/filters
Supported type:
  • text- 32/64 bits floats line (.txt) in rephase
  • S16_LE- 16 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • S24_LE- 24 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • S24_LE- 32 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • FLOAT_LE- 32 bits floating point (.pcm)
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits mono (.wav) from Acourate*
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits IEEE-754 (.dbl) in rephase
To autoswitch with samplerate, name your filters like that :
  • myfilter-44100
  • myfilter-48000
  • myfilter-88200
DOC_RFILTER:
Right filter


Select Right filter file. File must be located in /INTERNAL/FusionDsp/filters
Supported type:
  • text- 32/64 bits floats line (.txt) in rephase
  • S16_LE- 16 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • S24_LE- 24 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • S24_LE- 32 bits LPCM mono (.wav) in rePhase*
  • FLOAT_LE- 32 bits floating point (.pcm)
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits mono (.wav) from Acourate*
  • FLOAT64_LE- 64 bits IEEE-754 (.dbl) in rephase
To autoswitch with samplerate, name your filters like that :
  • myfilter-44100
  • myfilter-48000
  • myfilter-88200
DIFF_FILTER_TYPE_MESS: All filters must be of the same type
FILTER_LENGTH_MESS: Filter is not usable! Filter size must be power of 2!
DOC_DETECT_CLIPPING: If enabled, clipping detection is provided when settings are set
CLIPPING_DETECT_MESS: Depend on your filter, clipping may occur. The plugin can detect it and apply required attenuation. If something is played, it will be stop. ---> WARNING! <--- A full volume pink noise is going to be played. Volume should be mute while playing if your hardware supports it. It is safe to turn down the volume. Press 'Test' to do that or Exit.
RESAMPLING_WARN: Resampling must be disabled in playback settings in order to enable this feature
RESAMPLING_RATE_DOC: Select resampling target rate. DAC dependant
RESAMPLINGQ_DOC: Select the resampling quality. Higher is more CPU load. Suggested choice is ++
DOC_FILE_TO_CONVERT: Must be a 32-bit mono wav file impulse from REW. Placed in /INTERNAL/Dsp/filter-sources in the shared folder of Volumio
DOC_TARGET_CURVE: Text file containing the curve you whish for your filter. Placed in /INTERNAL/Dsp/target_curves in the shared folder of Volumio
DOC_OUTPUT_FILE_NAME: Leave empty to use the name of the file to convert or give a name. The plugin will add the rample rate, the target curve and the extension (.pcm)
DOC_DRCCONFIG: Config for DRC. Change it if you experience problem with filter generated... Soft is a good setting!
FILTER_GENE_MESS: Please WAIT until this page is refreshed (about 1 minute).
FILTER_GENE_FAIL: Fails to generate filter, retry with other parameters
FILTER_GENE_FAIL_RATE: Sample rate must be set to 96Khz maximum', 'for automatic filter generation')
FILTER_GENE_FAIL_TC: You must choose a target curve!
FILTER_GENE_FAIL_FILE: You must choose a file to convert!
SAMPLE_WARNING_MESS: Check you are using a filter designed for this sample rate or you'll get weird sound result...
DESC_REMOVE_TOOLS: Remove tools files from your system
DESC_INSTALL_TOOLS: Install tools to help measurements. PLEASE WAIT UNTIL UI IS REFRESHED
TOOLS_INSTALL_WAIT: Your are going to download about 17Mo. Please WAIT until this page is refreshed (about 40 sec).
DOC_TOOLS_FILE_TO_PLAY: Choose a file to play. Must be located in /INTERNAL/FusionDsp/tools/
DELAY_SCOPE_DOC: Enter on which channel apply the delay
